name: Pyramid Corruption
description:
Mr. Cube's friend was captured and corrupted by the pyramids. Your job is to survive and stop your old friend from creating chaos. Be sure to reload since your ammo capacity is only 2 cubes or you will fail to stop you friend. Too dark? Don't be afraid! Use your cubes inner light to know where to step!

// Game was created for the United Game Jam 2020 with the theme being "two".

Game models are set in black and white, Player is killed when hit twice by projectiles. Player has to reload after shooting 2 cubes.
